description:
Kenshiro finally confronts his old nemesis, Shin. But he is shocked to hear that Yuria has already committed suicide and left this world.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Conclusion of Part One: Yuria Forever... and Shin!!
Dai Ichi Bu Kanketsu: Yuria Towa ni.... Soshite Shin yo!
第一部完結 ユリア永遠[とわ]に.... そしてシンよ!
